pli-tv-bu-vb-pj3:1.1.13: Just as a young woman or man—someone fond of adornments, who had just washed her hair—would be ashamed, humiliated, and disgusted if the carcase of a snake, a dog, or a man were hung around her neck,

pli-tv-bu-vb-pj3:1.1.18: This bowl and these robe will be yours.”
